system.effect: Effect: You becoming Blazing. While you are Blazing, whenever your Fire-Type Moves Inflict Burn, the Burned target immediately loses a Tick of Hit Points, and loses an additional Combat Stage in Defense. While Blazing, when you hit a foe with a damaging Fire-Type Move, you may choose to automatically burn one target of the Move. If you do, you lose the Blazing Condition after the Moveâ€™s effects are resolved.
system.name: Blazing Inferno

ptu.prereqBackup: Fire Breather Rank 2, Master Focus or Combat
